body_html:
Ping for @jart.

I'm a little worried about this because using 'defines' propagates these defines to all libraries that depend on on this. Given that these defines are very generic sounding, it's likely to cause conflicts in the future. I don't have a good suggestion on how to deal with this though.
body_text:
Ping for @jart.
I'm a little worried about this because using 'defines' propagates these defines to all libraries that depend on on this.  Given that these defines are very generic sounding, it's likely to cause conflicts in the future.  I don't have a good suggestion on how to deal with this though.
body:
Ping for @jart.

I'm a little worried about this because using 'defines' propagates these defines to all libraries that depend on on this.  Given that these defines are very generic sounding, it's likely to cause conflicts in the future.  I don't have a good suggestion on how to deal with this though.
